name: GetTransferList
description:
Retrieve a paginated list of transfers.

Use this tool to get a list of financial transfers, including pagination details for navigating large datasets. It helps in checking transaction histories and managing transfer records.

parameters.name: filter_by_sync_status
parameters.description: Specify the sync status to filter transfers. Options: NOT_SYNC_READY, SYNCED, SYNC_READY.

value_schema.description: Filter by sync status. Supersedes has_no_sync_commits if both are provided.

parameters.name: transfer_status_filter
parameters.description: Specify the status to filter transfers by, using predefined status codes. Accepts values such as 'ACH_CONFIRMED', 'CANCELED', 'COMPLETED', etc.

value_schema.description: Filter by transfer status. See [Transfers Guide](/developer-api/v1/guides/transfers) for definitions.

parameters.name: business_entity_id
parameters.description: Filter transfers based on the specified business entity ID.

parameters.name: filter_by_statement_id
parameters.description: Include only transfers associated with the specified statement ID.

value_schema.description: Filter transfers included in the specified statement.

parameters.name: filter_from_date
parameters.description: Specify the date to filter transfers that occurred after this date, in ISO8601 format.

value_schema.description: Filter transfers that occurred after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: filter_transfers_before_date
parameters.description: Filter transfers that occurred before this date (in ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter transfers that occurred before this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity on the previous page to fetch the next set of results in pagination.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page, between 2 and 100. Defaults to 20 if unspecified.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

parameters.name: filter_unsynced_transfers
parameters.description: Filter transfers that have not been synced when set to true.

value_schema.description: Filter transfers that have not been synced.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: sync_status
parameters.description: Filter by sync status. Supersedes has_no_sync_commits if both are provided.

value_schema.description: Filter by sync status. Supersedes has_no_sync_commits if both are provided.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by transfer status. See [Transfers Guide](/developer-api/v1/guides/transfers) for definitions.

value_schema.description: Filter by transfer status. See [Transfers Guide](/developer-api/v1/guides/transfers) for definitions.

parameters.name: statement_id
parameters.description: Filter transfers included in the specified statement.

value_schema.description: Filter transfers included in the specified statement.

parameters.name: has_no_sync_commits
parameters.description: Filter transfers that have not been synced.

value_schema.description: Filter transfers that have not been synced.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter transfers that occurred after this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter transfers that occurred after this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter transfers that occurred before this date (ISO8601 format).

value_schema.description: Filter transfers that occurred before this date (ISO8601 format).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
